nodes.bodyText:
Could you please:

Write ! nearbyParentFragment.backButtonClicked() instead of nearbyParentFragment.backButtonClicked()==false (it is a usual convention)
Move the comment to the line before (so that no line is too long)

Thanks!

afterCommit.message:
Adds more obvious display for limited connection mode (#4094)

* Limited connection is enabled layout is added

* Add a layout to indicate limited connection is active

* fix string

nodes.bodyText: Minor change: Could you please rephrase to: If function nearbyParentFragment.backButtonClick() returns false, it means that the bottomsheet is not expanded. So if the back button is pressed, then go back to the Contributions tab. Thanks!

Please replace the text of this comment with this text: If function nearbyParentFragment.backButtonClick() returns false, it means that the bottomsheet is not expanded. So if the back button is pressed, then go back to the Contributions tab
